definition: A device designed to secure and protect individuals in various modes of transportation, typically consisting of straps or belts that fasten around the body to prevent injury during sudden movements or accidents. It is commonly used in vehicles to ensure passenger safety.

examples.german: Der Sicherheitsgurt muss immer angelegt sein.
examples.english: The seat belt must always be fastened.

examples.german: Bitte schnallen Sie sich mit dem Sicherheitsgurt an.
examples.english: Please buckle up with the seat belt.

examples.german: Vergessen Sie nicht, den Sicherheitsgurt anzulegen.
examples.english: Don't forget to put on your seat belt.
The seat belt is legally required.
